trans-unit.source: Allows you to subscribe to incoming events.
trans-unit.target: Lar deg til å abonnere på innkommende hendelser.

trans-unit.source: Each time a desired event is published to an event log, the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref> event is raised, and the method that handles this event will be executed.
trans-unit.target: Hver gang en ønsket hendelsen er publisert til en hendelseslogg den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"> </xref> denne hendelsen oppstår, og metoden som behandler denne hendelsen vil bli utført.

trans-unit.source: The instances of this class are created from <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery> objects, which specify a query for the event subscription.
trans-unit.target: Forekomster av denne klassen er opprettet fra <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery>objekter, som angir en spørring for hendelsesabonnementet.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogQuery>

trans-unit.source: When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Når en hendelse logges som oppfyller kriteriene uttrykt i spørringen, og deretter den <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"></xref> class by specifying an event query.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"> </xref> klassen ved å angi en hendelsesspørring.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a query for the event subscription.
trans-unit.target: Angir en spørring for hendelsesabonnementet.

trans-unit.source: When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Når en hendelse logges som oppfyller kriteriene uttrykt i spørringen, og deretter den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"> </xref> hendelsen skjer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"></xref> class by specifying the name or path to an event log.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"> </xref> klassen ved å angi navnet på eller banen til en hendelseslogg.

trans-unit.source: The path or name of the event log monitor for events.
trans-unit.target: Banen eller navnet på hendelsesloggen overvåkingen for hendelser.

trans-unit.source: If any event is logged in this event log, then the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en hendelse er logget på denne hendelsesloggen vil <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"> </xref> hendelsen skjer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"></xref> class by specifying an event query and a bookmark that is used as starting position for the query.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"> </xref> klassen ved å angi en hendelsesspørring og et bokmerke som brukes som Startposisjon for spørringen.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a query for the event subscription.
trans-unit.target: Angir en spørring for hendelsesabonnementet.

trans-unit.source: When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Når en hendelse logges som oppfyller kriteriene uttrykt i spørringen, og deretter den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"> </xref> hendelsen skjer.

trans-unit.source: The bookmark (placeholder) used as a starting position in the event log or stream of events.
trans-unit.target: Bokmerket (plassholder) brukes som en startposisjonen i hendelsesloggen eller dataflyten for hendelser.

trans-unit.source: Only events that have been logged after the bookmark event will be returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: Bare hendelser som er logget etter at hendelsen bokmerke returneres av spørringen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"></xref> class by specifying an event query, a bookmark that is used as starting position for the query, and a Boolean value that determines whether to read the events that already exist in the event log.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher"> </xref> klassen ved å angi en hendelsesspørring, et bokmerke som brukes som Startposisjon for spørringen og en boolsk verdi som bestemmer om å lese hendelsene som finnes i hendelsesloggen.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a query for the event subscription.
trans-unit.target: Angir en spørring for hendelsesabonnementet.

trans-unit.source: When an event is logged that matches the criteria expressed in the query, then the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"></xref> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Når en hendelse logges som oppfyller kriteriene uttrykt i spørringen, og deretter den <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogWatcher.EventRecordWritten"> </xref> hendelsen skjer.

trans-unit.source: The bookmark (placeholder) used as a starting position in the event log or stream of events.
trans-unit.target: Bokmerket (plassholder) brukes som en startposisjonen i hendelsesloggen eller dataflyten for hendelser.

trans-unit.source: Only events that have been logged after the bookmark event will be returned by the query.
trans-unit.target: Bare hendelser som er logget etter at hendelsen bokmerke returneres av spørringen.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that determines whether to read the events that already exist in the event log.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi som bestemmer om du kan lese hendelser som allerede finnes i hendelsesloggen.

trans-unit.source: If this value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, then the existing events are read and if this value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, then the existing events are not read.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne verdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, og deretter eksisterende hendelser blir lest, og hvis denne verdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, og deretter eksisterende hendelser ikke leses.

trans-unit.source: Releases all the resources used by this object.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by this object, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av dette objektet, og frigir eventuelt administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this object starts delivering events to the event delegate.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om dette objektet starter levere hendelser hendelsen-representant.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when this object can deliver events to the event delegate, and returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when this object has stopped delivery.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> når dette objektet kan levere hendelser til hendelsen representanten, og returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> når dette objektet har stoppet levering.

trans-unit.source: Allows setting a delegate (event handler method) that gets called every time an event is published that matches the criteria specified in the event query for this object.
trans-unit.target: Tillater innstillingen representant (metode for hendelsesbehandling) som henter kalles hver gang en hendelse er publisert som oppfyller kriteriene angitt i spørringen for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
